description:
Learn the basic concepts and functions that you will need to be able to use mathematical functions.

Build a strong foundation in maths functions with this tutorial for beginners.

  • Polynomials e.g. linear, quadratic, cubic and quartic functions.
  • Root and power functions
  • Transcendental functions e.g. trigonometric functions etc.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Over 15 lectures and 1.5 hours of content!
  • Learn maths functions from an experienced maths tutor from your own desk.
  • Suitable for beginner.
  • Realistic examples with solutions!

--- Update 27th January 2016 ---

You will get a coupon for an following advanced maths course, when you complete this basic maths course !!!

title: Maths Functions for Beginners
